content:
From: Dmitriy Traytel <traytel@di.ku.dk>
Dear all,

I am looking to fill a PhD and a postdoc position at the University of Copenhagen from early 2025 both on the topic of formally verified, distributed data stream processing:

PhD position: https://jobportal.ku.dk/phd/?show=162724
Postdoc position: https://employment.ku.dk/faculty/?show=162682

The application deadline is 31 October 2024, 23:59 CET.
The positions are funded by a grant from the Independent Research Fund Denmark (DFF).

Familiarity with proof assistants or verification of distributed systems is a big plus.

Feel free to contact me, if you have any questions or know suitable candidates.

Best wishes,
Dmitriy
